detailed_descriptions: Partly sunny, with a high near 42. East southeast wind around 7 mph.
Showers likely, mainly after 4am.  Cloudy, with a low around 33. East southeast wind 7 to 11 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

Showers and possibly a thunderstorm.  High near 56. East southeast wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm, then rain and possibly a thunderstorm after 7pm.  Low around 42. East southeast wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
A chance of rain before 1pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 49. Breezy, with a southwest wind 16 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 40%.
A chance of snow after 1am.  Cloudy, with a low around 31. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
Snow.  High near 36. Breezy.  Chance of precipitation is 80%.
Mostly cloudy, with a high near 38.
Mostly cloudy, with a low around 29.
A chance of rain.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 44.
A chance of rain and snow.  Cloudy, with a low around 34.
A chance of rain and snow.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 44.
